prime_checker module¶

class prime_checker.PrimeChecker(number: int)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class used to check if a number is prime.

Attributes¶

numberint

The number to check for primality.

Methods¶

is_prime() -> bool

Returns True if the number is prime, False otherwise.

is_prime() → bool[source]¶

Check if the number provided during initialization is a prime number.

A prime number is a natural number greater than 1. This number has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself.

Returns¶

bool

True if the number is prime, False otherwise.
